titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Yellow Ribbon Day in honor of members of the Armed Forces who are serving overseas apart from their families and loved ones.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/31/2011--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of Yellow Ribbon Day in honor of members of the Armed Forces serving overseas apart from their families and loved ones.
